preqs: AFC2340 or ETC2430 or BFC2340 or by permission.

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 1 units in {AFC2340, BFC2340, ETC2430} or  Permission required)
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETC2430} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit focuses on the modelling and valuation of cash flows dependent on death, survival, or other uncertain risks.
